name: Escape the graveyard!
description:
A local multiplayer game with no separate inputs.

The Q and D keys make Player 1 move laterally. But Player 2 can hold Shift while Player 1 is maneuvering, making him move instead.

Try holding or releasing Ctrl or Alt while Shift is held and watch how character control switches!

The first player to escape the graveyard wins.

Team members: Elias Saoud / Rym Saoud / Rayan Saoud

Made with Unreal Engine 4
